sqls.sql: SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT dc.ID ,dpi.NAME,dds.SUBMISSION_NO,dds.SUBMIT_DT,dc.LICENSEE_ID, ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY dc.ID ORDER BY dds.SUBMIT_DT DESC) AS rn FROM hcsal.dbo.ds_cycle dc,hcsal.dbo.ds_data_submission dds,hcsal.dbo.ds_patient_information dpi WHERE 1=1 AND dds.CYCLE_ID = dc.ID AND dpi.PATIENT_CODE = dc.PATIENT_CODE AND dc.STATUS NOT IN ('DS003','DS005','DS006','DS007','DS016','DS017','DS018') AND cast(dc.ID AS VARCHAR(255)) NOT IN ( SELECT jrmt.REF_NO FROM iaismstr.dbo.job_remind_msg_tracking jrmt ) ) t WHERE t.rn = 1 <#if dateFilter??> AND t.SUBMIT_DT < convert(date,:dateFilter,103) </#if>

sql.remarks: search cycle that has notified over 3 days

sqls.sql: SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT dc.ID ,dpi.NAME,dds.SUBMISSION_NO,dds.SUBMIT_DT,dc.LICENSEE_ID,jrmt.CREATED_DT, ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY jrmt.REF_NO ORDER BY jrmt.CREATED_DT DESC) AS rn FROM hcsal.dbo.ds_cycle dc, hcsal.dbo.ds_data_submission dds, hcsal.dbo.ds_patient_information dpi, iaismstr.dbo.job_remind_msg_tracking jrmt WHERE 1=1 AND dds.CYCLE_ID = dc.ID AND dpi.PATIENT_CODE = dc.PATIENT_CODE AND jrmt.REF_NO = cast(dc.ID AS VARCHAR(255)) AND jrmt.CREATED_DT > dds.SUBMIT_DT ) t WHERE t.rn = 1 <#if dateFilter??> AND t.CREATED_DT < convert(date,:dateFilter,103) </#if>
